languages.text: {n}Взревев, часть бойцов сотворяет символ аквилы и достает гранаты. Бледные пальцы каждого из них крепко сжимают чеку: они готовятся отдать свои жизни подороже, забрав с собой столько врагов Человечества, сколько удастся.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Взревев, часть бойцов сотворяет символ аквилы и достает гранаты. Бледные пальцы каждого из них крепко сжимают чеку: они готовятся отдать свои жизни подороже, забрав с собой столько врагов Человечества, сколько удастся.{/n}

languages.text: {n}With a roar, some of the fighters make the sign of the Aquila and ready their grenades. Their pale fingers clutch the pins as they steel themselves for a fight to the inevitable death, intent on taking as many enemies of Humanity with them as they can.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Взревев, часть бойцов сотворяет символ аквилы и достает гранаты. Бледные пальцы каждого из них крепко сжимают чеку: они готовятся отдать свои жизни подороже, забрав с собой столько врагов Человечества, сколько удастся.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}With a roar, some of the fighters make the sign of the Aquila and prepare grenades. Their pale fingers clutch the pins as they steel themselves for a fight to the inevitable death, intent on taking as many enemies of Humanity with them as they can.{/n}

{n}With a roar, some of the fighters make the sign of the Aquila and ready their grenades. Their pale fingers clutch the pins as they steel themselves for a fight to the inevitable death, intent on taking as many enemies of Humanity with them as they can.{/n}

{n}With a roar, some of the fighters make the sign of the Aquila and ready their grenades. Their pale fingers clutch the pins as they steel themselves for a fight to the inevitable death, intent on taking as many enemies of Humanity with them as they can.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dans un rugissement, certains combattants font le signe de l'Aquila et sortent des grenades. Leurs doigts pâles se referment sur les goupilles tandis qu'ils se préparent pour leur ultime combat. Ils ne mourront pas sans emporter un maximum de xénos dans la tombe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a roar, some of the fighters make the sign of the Aquila and ready their grenades. Their pale fingers clutch the pins as they steel themselves for a fight to the inevitable death, intent on taking as many enemies of Humanity with them as they can.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans un rugissement, certains combattants font le signe de l'Aquila et sortent des grenades. Leurs doigts pâles se referment sur les goupilles tandis qu'ils se préparent pour leur ultime combat. Ils ne mourront pas sans emporter de xénos dans la tombe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}战士们爆发出怒吼声。一部分战士做了个双头鹰手势，准备好了手雷。他们苍白的指节紧握着手雷的保险栓，做好了壮烈牺牲的准备，决心在临死之前尽可能地消灭人类之敌。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a roar, some of the fighters make the sign of the Aquila and ready their grenades. Their pale fingers clutch the pins as they steel themselves for a fight to the inevitable death, intent on taking as many enemies of Humanity with them as they can.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}战士们爆发出怒吼声。一部分战士做了个双头鹰手势，准备好了手雷。他们苍白的指节紧握着手雷的保险栓，做好了壮烈牺牲的准备，决心在临死之前尽可能地消灭人类之敌。{/n}

languages.text: {n}何人かの闘士が怒号を上げながらアクィラの印を結び、手榴弾を手に取って構えた。青白い指をピンにかける彼らは、この死を覚悟した非情な戦いで人類の敵を一人でも多く道連れするつもりのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a roar, some of the fighters make the sign of the Aquila and ready their grenades. Their pale fingers clutch the pins as they steel themselves for a fight to the inevitable death, intent on taking as many enemies of Humanity with them as they can.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}何人かの闘士が怒号を上げながらアクィラの印を結び、手榴弾を手に取って構えた。青白い指をピンにかける彼らは、この死を覚悟した非情な戦いで人類の敵を一人でも多く道連れするつもりのようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mit einem Brüllen machen manche Kämpfer das Zeichen des Adlers und entsichern ihre Granaten. Ihre bleichen Finger umfassen die Stifte an den Granaten und bereiten sich mental darauf vor, zu kämpfen und den sicheren Tod zu finden, dabei aber so viele Feinde der Menschheit mitzunehmen wie möglich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a roar, some of the fighters make the sign of the Aquila and ready their grenades. Their pale fingers clutch the pins as they steel themselves for a fight to the inevitable death, intent on taking as many enemies of Humanity with them as they can.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem Brüllen machen manche Kämpfer das Zeichen des Adlers und bereiten Granaten vor. Ihre bleichen Finger umfassen die Stifte an den Granaten und bereiten sich mental darauf vor, zu kämpfen und den sicheren Tod zu finden, dabei aber so viele Feinde der Menschheit mitzunehmen wie möglich.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con un grito, algunos de los combatientes se persignan con el signo del Aquila y preparan sus granadas. Agarran las anillas con dedos temblorosos y se aprestan para un inevitable combate a muerte, dispuestos a llevarse por delante a tantos enemigos de la Humanidad como puedan.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a roar, some of the fighters make the sign of the Aquila and ready their grenades. Their pale fingers clutch the pins as they steel themselves for a fight to the inevitable death, intent on taking as many enemies of Humanity with them as they can.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un grito, algunos de los combatientes se persignan con el signo del Aquila y preparan sus granadas. Agarran las anillas con dedos temblorosos y se aprestan para un inevitable combate a muerte, dispuestos a llevarse por delante a tantos enemigos de la Humanidad como puedan.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Savaşçılardan bazıları, kükreme eşliğinde Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yaparak el bombalarına davranıyor. Kaçınılmaz ölümün gölgesinde savaşmak için kendilerini hazırlıyor, soluk elleriyle pimleri kavrıyorlar. İnsanlık düşmanlarından da götürebildikleri kadarını götürmeye niyetliler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a roar, some of the fighters make the sign of the Aquila and ready their grenades. Their pale fingers clutch the pins as they steel themselves for a fight to the inevitable death, intent on taking as many enemies of Humanity with them as they can.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Savaşçılardan bazıları, kükreme eşliğinde Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yaparak el bombalarına davranıyor. Kaçınılmaz ölümün gölgesinde savaşmak için kendilerini hazırlıyor, soluk elleriyle pimleri kavrıyorlar. İnsanlık düşmanlarından da götürebildikleri kadarını götürmeye niyetliler.{/n}
